alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN INDIANA AND EAST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Indiana, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rural Valley, Dayton, Rossiter, Ernest, Marion Center, Cherry Tree, Creekside, Plumville, Glen Campbell, Atwood, Dixonville, Commodore, Smicksburg, and Rochester Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for west central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana
